name: Bard

grantsPowers.name: Verses Of Victory
grantsPowers.description: Song: Increase Group Attack, Support Power

description: Bards are quick to jump in with a motivating song or a tune that is sweet and spiriting. The knowledge behind the power of song is a key element; music can provide a restorative feeling and can guard even the weariest of spirits. The importance of an encore is also truly unique to a bard - always leave them wanting more...
lore: This Bard sings tales of grandeur and woe. Oft a man whose nefarious deeds caused the gods to take notice and interfere in mortal affairs, bringing rules to a ruleless world. Known commonly as Fansy.
